input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Witin sirpi sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: She/He is small.
Translate from Miskito to English: Tuktiki tiara sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: My child is young.
Translate from Miskito to English: Nini Jan sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: My name is John.
Translate from Miskito to English: Pedro umpira sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: Pedro is poor.
Translate from Miskito to English: Naha sirpi sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: This is small.
Translate from Miskito to English: Baha nini sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: That is my name.
Translate from Miskito to English: Naha yaptiki sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: This is my mother.
Translate from Miskito to English: Waitna ba umpira sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: The man is poor.
Translate from Miskito to English: Mairin ba sin umpira sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: The woman is poor too.
Translate from Miskito to English: Mairin na yaptiki sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: This woman is my mother.
Translate from Miskito to English: Pedro waitna kum sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: Pedro is a man.
Translate from Miskito to English: Naha yul kum sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: This is a dog.
Translate from Miskito to English: Baha daiwan kum sa.
Translate from English to Miskito: That is an animal.
Translate from Miskito to English: Tibil ba rum ra sa.

ideal: The table is in the room.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Tibil nani ba rum ra sa.

ideal: The tables are in the room.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Tuktiki ba miriki sa.
Translate from Miskito to English, after putting 'nani' after the word in italics: Tibil ba rum ra sa.

ideal: The tables are in the room.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English, after putting 'nani' after the word in italics: Tibil nani ba rum ra sa.

ideal: The tables are in the rooms.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English, after putting 'nani' after the word in italics: Tuktiki ba miriki sa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Witin utla ra sa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Witin nani rum ra sa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Baha nani ba tuktiki nani sa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Yawan miriki nani sa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Tibil ba rum ra sa.

ideal: The table is in the room.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Tuktiki ba utla ra pulisa.

ideal: My child is playing in the house.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Mary Miskitu aisisa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Miguel plun piakisa.
Translate from Miskito to English: Mairin nani ba nanara dia daukisa?

ideal: What are the women doing now?

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Yaptikam anira sa? — Yaptiki nahara sa.

ideal: Where is your mother? — My mother is here.

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: Where is your mother? — My mother is here.

ideal: Yaptikam anira sa? — Yaptiki nahara sa.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Aisikam aula ki? — Apia, witin nahara balras.

ideal: Is your father coming? — No, he is not coming here.

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: Is your father coming? — No, he is not coming here.

ideal: Aisikam aula ki? — Apia, witin nahara balras.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Yawan bahara auya.
Translate from English to Miskito: We are going there.
Translate from Miskito to English: Mairin ba bahara dia muni iwisa?

ideal: Why is the woman sitting there?

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: Why is the woman sitting there?

ideal: Mairin ba bahara dia muni iwisa?

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Nanara witin iwras, witin baha wina nahara aula.

ideal: She isn't sitting now, she is coming from there to here.

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: She isn't sitting now, she is coming from there to here.

ideal: Nanara witin iwras, witin baha wina nahara aula.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Miriki nani ba Bilwi ra dia muni waras ki?

ideal: Why aren't the Americans going to Bilwi?

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: Why aren't the Americans going to Bilwi?

ideal: Miriki nani ba Bilwi ra dia muni waras ki?

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Man nani Miskitu aisisma ki?
Translate from English to Miskito: Do you (plural) speak Miskito?
Translate from Miskito to English: Yang nani krikri ra auna.
Translate from English to Miskito: We (exclusive) are going to bed.
Translate from Miskito to English: Witin nani dia want sa ki?
Translate from English to Miskito: What do they want?

ideal: Witin nani dia want sa ki?

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Man nani dur ba ahkia kwakwaisma?

ideal: When are you going to open the door?

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: When are you (pl.) going to open the door?

ideal: Man nani dur ba ahkia kwakwaisma?

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Yang nani dur ba yauhka kwakwaisna, bara man nani dimaisma.

ideal: We will open the door tomorrow, and then you will come in.

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: We will open the door tomorrow, and then you will come in.

ideal: Yang nani dur ba yauhka kwakwaisna, bara man nani dimaisma.

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Witin nani naha tiarka nani ra dia muni ikan?

ideal: Why did they kill these youths?

input.content: Translate from English to Miskito: Why did they kill these youths?

ideal: Witin nani naha tiarka nani ra dia muni ikan?

input.content: Translate from Miskito to English: Yang nani nu apia sna.
Translate from English to Miskito: We don't know.
